nodes.text: The AAT Driver Battle Droid was a variant of the B1-series battle droid used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. They had tactical camouflage markings that designated their role as tank operators.
Droids of this model were deployed as Armored Assault Tank commanders on Rugosa under the command of OOM command battle droid 224.
The AAT Driver battle droid first appeared in "Ambush," the first episode of the animated television series Star Wars: The Clone Wars' first season, which originally aired on October 3, 2008.
